From , 1,014 adults were polled by telephone. Margin of sampling error is ±3 percentage points. The possible error is larger for subgroups, ranging from ±4 points for women to ±10 points for those without health insurance.

twitter.description: With another fiscal deadline looming in Washington, The New York Times and CBS News asked Americans for their opinion on the federal budget, government spending and President Obama’s job performance.
twitter.title: Americans’ Views on the President
